title: Swap Shifts with a Coworker
description: An associate needs to swap their upcoming shift with a coworker.

tasks.description: Find a coworker who is willing to swap shifts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate makes an agreement with another employee.

tasks.description: Log into the scheduling system and initiate a 'Shift Swap' request, selecting their shift and the coworker's shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal swap request is created in the system.

tasks.description: The request is sent to a manager for approval. Once approved, the schedules for both associates are updated.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shift swap is approved and reflected in the official schedule.
